Literature.Title: Antibacterial action of synthetic anti-lipopolysaccharide peptides (SALP) involves neutralization of both membrane-bound and free toxins.
Literature.Author: Correa W, Heinbockel L, Behrends J, Kaconis Y, Barcena-Varela S, Gutsmann T, Mauss K, Schürholz T, Schromm AB, Martinez de Tejada G, Brandenburg K

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>512µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CUN 4158-02(MIC=>512µg/ml),Bordetella bronchiseptica CUN 11844-99(MIC=>512µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>512µg/ml)
